content:
Download Issues – customer service requests for issues with downloading content 

New Account – set up a new account with a new email address 

Request Show – users may contact the company to suggests movies or shows to add to the catalog  

Complaint – customer complaint about inappropriate content on the platform 

Feature Suggestion – feedback form to suggest new user features to improve quality of life

Classify customer intent of the following utterance in yaml format - the classification must be from one of the categories defined above. 

EXCUSE ME I just found my 14-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTER watching a show on your platform. I thought you were a responsible, moralistic company, but the show she was watching had underage teenagers DRINKING with absolutely NO WARNING and you even had the AUDACITY to rate it PG-13??? Unbelievable. You should go back to your roots and feature wholesome content like Beth on the Farm and Peter the Guppy. shame on you

rejected:
-   Complaint: Inappropriate Content
      About: A show with underage drinking, no warning labels, and a PG-13 rating
      Disapproval of content featuring: Teenagers drinking alcohol
      Suggested changes: Rating change to TV-MA, include warning labels on episodes/seasons, remove explicit scenes
      Additional Feedback: Company is not living up to its "moralistic" standards
      Requested Action: Review content guidelines and take appropriate action 
         (possibly removing the show from the platform)
